response.title: LitPark Announcement: BEA Signing and Party News!
response.message:
A quick announcement that Book Expo America (BEA) is just around the corner, and I would love to see you there.
I’ll be signing galleys of UP FROM THE BLUE at Table 29, 10:30-11:00 a.m., Wednesday, May 26. That means, even though the book doesn’t come out until September, you can get an early copy. I [...]
